mapper.select: select count(MEMBER_EMAIL) from MEMBER_TABLE where MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER_TABLE values( MEMBER_TABLE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_email}, #{member_nickName}, #{member_authKey}, 0, SYSDATE )
